meanings.definition: A person who specializes in technology.
meanings.sent1: The technologists at the company developed a new software program.
meanings.sent2: Many technologists work in the field of computer science.
meanings.sent3: The technologists had a competition to see who could fix the most computers in an hour.
meanings.sent4: She was a wizard with technology, like one of those technologists you see in movies.
meanings.sent5: The team of technologists transformed the old website into a modern masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Those who are skilled in the use of technology.
meanings.sent1: Our school hired technologists to help teachers integrate technology into their lessons.
meanings.sent2: The technologists in the IT department are always available to assist with any tech issues.
meanings.sent3: The group of technologists organized a tech-themed party for their colleagues.
meanings.sent4: He was a master of technology, just like the technologists who design cutting-edge gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The technologists effortlessly fixed the glitch, impressing everyone with their skills.
